attributes.description: This dashboard shows machine logs collected by the Microsoft Defender Endpoint integration.

params.markdown:
**Navigation**

**Microsoft Defender for Endpoint**

- [Overview](#/dashboard/microsoft_defender_endpoint-65402c30-ca6a-11ea-9d4d-9737a63aaa55)
- **Machine Overview**
- [Machine Action Overview](#/dashboard/microsoft_defender_endpoint-6a043fee-1e3d-454b-96d1-159e6efce215)
- [Vulnerability Overview](#/dashboard/microsoft_defender_endpoint-afb93ff7-9903-4d91-9028-9fe9c5a434f8)

**Overview**

This dashboard displays key insights based on machine logs from the Microsoft Defender for Endpoint integration. It includes metrics for active, inactive and total machines, visual breakdowns of machines by health status, operating system, exposure level, and risk level, along with detailed information about each machine.

[Integration Page](/app/integrations/detail/microsoft_defender_endpoint/overview)
